patthana16.26:4.1: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.26:4.2: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.26:4.3: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pe … satta pañhā.
patthana16.26:5.1: Dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta pañhā.
patthana16.26:6.1: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta pañhā.
patthana16.26:7.1: Hetuyā ekavīsa … pe … vipāke cuddasa … pe … avigate ekavīsa.
patthana16.26:8.1: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.26:8.2: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.26:8.3: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto nanahetu ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana16.26:9.1: Dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana16.26:10.1: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana16.26:11.1: Hetuyā nava … pe … vipāke cha … pe … avigate nava.
